titleSection.name: VersionOne Estimation Tool
titleSection.shortDescription: Group workitems into buckets and apply estimate values to all of the items in a bucket.

descriptionSection.description: Divide VersionOne items into an arbitrary number of groupings or
and then apply estimate values to all of the items based on which bucket it is in.

updates.releaseNotes: Initial release as a distinct product.

seed.shortDescription: Early access build. Use with caution.

sapling.shortDescription: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

mature.shortDescription: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.

mediaSection.title: Configuring Visual Studios
mediaSection.caption: View code changes for a story or defect quickly by integrating VersionOne with your source code manager.

mediaSection.title: IDE: Visual Studios
mediaSection.caption: View code changes for a story or defect quickly by integrating VersionOne with your source code manager.
